DOC.brief_summary: Acupuncture may affect nerve functions. This study assesses the effect of acupuncture on both the peripheral and the central nerve systems
DOC.brief_title: To Study the Mechanisms of Acupuncture Through Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging and Peripheral Neurosensory Testing
DOC.criteria: Age 18 to 80 Male and female No acupuncture treatment for the past 2 weeks No analgesics for the past 2 weeks Absence of neuropathic pain states History of psychological illness History of Claustrophobia Lack of ability to understand the experimental protocol and to adequately communicate in English Pregnancy Pending litigation History of head trauma History of trauma or surgery to lower extremities and pelvic area
